entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
